name: Moonlight Flower Hat Blueprint
description: Hat made according to Moonlight Flower.

name: Moonlight Flower Hat [1]
description: Hat made according to Moonlight Flower.
effect: When using physical skills, Caster has a 5% chance to increase Agility for 4 seconds. (Agi ＋10),When Refining 10, Agi ＋20

name: Moonlight Gentleman Top hat
description: A non-professional Mage. He joined the Dark Moon Circus by chance, and it's pleasing to see his excellent performance on the moon light.

name: Moonlight Headwear
description: The symbol of moon rose, inherits the courage and glory of every generation moon night rose.

name: Moonlight Mischief Rabbit Hat
description: The convention is that you should touch the rabbit's ear before doing tricks. Anyway, You should touch the rabbit's ear whether you are happy or not!

name: Moonlight monster
description: An otherworldly fashion Coloring Agent that adventurers can find from Moonlight Monsters. It can be used on Mandragora.

name: Moonlight monster Chest
description: A little monster seems to be in this box...

name: Moonlight's Gentle Touch
description: Quiet moonlight gently touches you and me. Can it be grasped?

name: Mora Blessing Box
description: Receive 5 Mora Coins after opening

name: Mora Lucky Bag
description: Cute Bear’s Mora lucky bag. Open to gain 20-60 Mora Coins with a chance to gain purple Headwear [Cute Bear].

description: A large mace that looks very violent.
